lines.text: He set himself on fire... to create an improvised weapon!
He'd take that bottle of blood, use the fire to bring it to a boil, and then... kapow!
Bottle of boiling blood and broken glass to Slick's unsuspecting face!
There's no way Slick woulda just waited there for the guy to boil some blood to throw at 'im.
He'd just get shot if he tried.
Well, yeah, that's what happened- but the idea was to go get the blood!
If that were true, we'd find the wizard's corpse in between the fire and the blood bottle, not over there.
